channel.title: Best way to learn Flash design
channel.description:
For part of my IT course we have to manage our own project and build a learning resource application using Flash or HTML. I was wondering what the best method to get as good as I can at Flash in a couple of months is.
Thanks

item.title: Best way to learn Flash design
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

Well i have not long started using flash and i went in with a game straight away because i feel if i set myself a something i cant do i will revise on how to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to learn Flash design
